snippet: Lee of South Korea kept the lead through Saturday’s third round of the Evian Championship, as Lydia Ko, 18, remained in contention to become the youngest player to win a major.
abstract: South Korean Mi Hyang Lee is in front in Evian Championship golf tournament with one-shot lead in third round over Lexi Thompson; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lee of South Korea kept the lead through Saturday’s third round of the Evian Championship, as Lydia Ko, 18, remained in contention to become the youngest player to win a major.
